J

JOIN_GAME - Enum constant in enum class org.myshelfie.network.client.UserInputEvent
Message to join an existing game
joinGame(JoinGameMessage) - Method in class org.myshelfie.controller.LobbyController
Executes the JoinGameCommand to join an existing game, adds the player to the list of players inside the game and subscribes the client to the event listener to make it receive updates from that game.
joinGame(JoinGameMessage) - Method in class org.myshelfie.network.server.Server
Make a client join an existing game
joinGame(JoinGameMessage) - Method in interface org.myshelfie.network.server.ServerRMIInterface
Joins an existing game on the server
JoinGame_BTN - Variable in class org.myshelfie.view.GUI.LobbyControllerFX
 
JoinGameCommand - Class in org.myshelfie.controller
This class implements a command (following the command design pattern) that adds a player to a game.

JoinGameMessage - Class in org.myshelfie.network.messages.commandMessages
With this message a Client communicates the will to join the game gameName
